oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WAVE POWER AND BEACH-STAGES: A GLOBAL MODEL
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Short, Andrew D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: global model
wave power
beach stage
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A three-dimensional morphodynamic model of sequential beach changes Is presented. The model Is based on variations in breaker wave power generating a predictable sequence of beach conditions. The spectrum of beach conditions from fully eroded-dissipatlve to fully accreted reflective is characterised by ten beach-stages. Using the breaker wave power to beach-stage relationship the model Is applied to explain temporal, spatial and global variations In beach morphodynamlcs.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 16 (1978): Proceedings of 16th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Hamburg, Germany, 1978.; 66
